messages.message: Hi all, as @Anant mentioned during all-hands today, we should all dedicate some time to exploring AI coding tools that assist our day-to-day work. I've repurposed our previous github copilot channel into <#C06JUUJFKDY|> as a forum for these topics and discussions. If you are using any tooling today that you would recommend to other engineers, please throw up a post about them in that channel soon! Looking forward to more discussion there :smile::thank_you:
